alert.note: Alert for Camden; Cumberland; Gloucester; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 2:19AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central New Castle, northeastern Kent, western Cumberland, Salem, northwestern Camden, Gloucester, southwestern Philadelphia and Delaware Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 219 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Elam to Dover Speedway. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Camden, Wilmington, Vineland, Dover, Millville, Bridgeton, Gloucester City, Chester, Deptford, West Deptford, Glassboro, Pennsville, Bellmawr, Yeadon, Woodbury, Smyrna, Pitman, Clayton and Carneys Point. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 1 and 3. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 22. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 10 and 23. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 345 and 351. Interstate 76 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 28. Interstate 676 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 1. Interstate 676 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
